channel.title: The 20 Minute Challenge!
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt][b]JV's 20 Minute Challenge![/b][/size][/center]
Just as a breif introduction, this is not anything official, there is no prize, it's just for fun, and to help you learn!
I, [b]JV[/b], challenge you to make the best web template you can in 20 minutes.
There is no way I will be able to check if you cheated or not, but if anybody's sad enough to cheat at something like this, God help them!
You can use whatever language you want, you can use whatever software you want! Just see what you can create in 20 minutes. Then, post it here, and we'll have a look. We'll leave feedback, help and advice. And hopefully, be in awe of our fellow forum-user's speedwork!
Happy speed-designing! (:
[hr]
[b]My design;[/b]
[size=10pt]COMING SOON[/size]

item.title: The 20 Minute Challenge!
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:2, topic:180390”]rofl wear your badge with pride
and on topic this will never work due to the time differences[/quote]

I don’t think you understand…?
The challenge is to make the best template you can in 20 minutes. You don’t have to start at the same time as everybody else. The only rule is that your template takes 20 minutes to create

Ixl Adds Ixl:

lol it would take me more then 20 minutes just to even get the css up

Then spend your time wisely

Read full topic
